General.Name: Chengdu B-ray Media Co Ltd
General.Description: Chengdu B-ray Media Co.,Ltd. engages in the media operations business in China. The company is also involved in the advertising, education, and printing businesses. In addition, it engages in the operation of online games; and microfinance business. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Chengdu, China.
General.Address: Block A, Borui Creative Chengdu bldg, Chengdu, China, 610063
